Text: Should I go for Employee 1's idea?
Option1: I think the idea is good.
Option2: It's too risky to delay the current projects we have.
Option3: I want to accept the idea| but I have reservations.

Text: How should we allocate the team to the workshop?
Option1: The whole team should do it.
Option2: Employee 1 should choose one other to do it with them to avoid siloing.
Option3: Leave it up to team members to decide if they want to go.
